root.name: Dark Gates
root.description: OverviewDark Gates is a game by Bartosz Debski and developed/released by DFour Games in Jul 30th 2012 as part of a alpha fund project on Desura. Game is an RPG dungeon crawler where chosen by player, team of six heroes enters a Labyrinth to find and destroy Dark Gates and the Unnamed - mage that is the keeper of the gates and master of the maze. Labyrinth itself is a randomly generated map which every time is different. Original concept of the game is from paper RPG Deathmaze also released as Citadel of Blood and Labirynt Åšmierci (Polish unlicensed release by Encore). In game art is mostly hand drawn using tablet and classical paints paper. Dark Gates are released on Linux, Windows and game is still in alpha stage.
